website_summaries.verdict: A 30-inch gas cooktop that features 4 sealed burners, continuous grates, and is ADA compliant.
pros: GE's 30-inch gas cooktop is easy to install and operate
The MAX system ensures there will be no loss of BTUs when converting from natural gas to LP and the front left burner features a power boil option for larger cookware
cons: The uniform placement of burners does not invite using cookware of different sizes

customer_reviews.title: Nice job, GE!!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old (1995) GE profile cook top. Plug and play replacement, could not have been easier! This is better in every way from the old model - easier to clean, better burners, better (although thinner) grates, better arrangement of the burners (they moved the large to the outside, so big pans and handles don't interfere with the controls). What more can I say? We've had it for a month, cook a lot, and love it!!
customer_reviews.author: oldmansknees

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Two problems; 1. The dimensions on the product page are of the shipping box- not the stove top itself. 2. It turned out to be unusable because the gas inlet on the bottom is fixed and sticks out quite a bit- into the top of the oven underneath the countertop. This is a critical dimension that should be mentioned and on the product page Can't tell you about the stove quality- had to send it back the same day it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: NorCal John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price great value. Don't think I would ever enjoy having six pots going at once so four is plenty! Burners are sized well. Unit is easy to clean and looks nice on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W.

customer_reviews.title: heats water up fast!
customer_reviews.text: This gas cooktop is great! We had an older GE model that was white (20 years old) and still working great, but we wanted to replace with stainless steel. My husband and I can't believe how quickly it heats food up. And we love the continuous grates that our older model did not have. And the grates have rubber feet so they don't scratch the cooktop. We've been using it about 11 months and loving it!
customer_reviews.author: donna2step

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. My existing cook top did not have a regulator. To install this cook top with the regulator, required that I purchase and install a 90 degree elbow below the cook top to obtain clearance. It was not practical for me to install the regulator in the alternate location shown in the instructions since I also didn’t have clearance at the gas pipe entry point. I don’t know why anyone would spend the extra money for a Profile. This unit seems just as nice and seems to have all the same features.
customer_reviews.author: logger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I ended up doing the installation myself and with the great instructions guiding me, the stovetop went right in. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron :-)

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Looks fantastic. A little smaller than our previous model, but still fits the hole in our countertop. Great purchase. Upgrade to the house. Burners are hot and work great. light east. Quick and easy install. Dishwasher safe grates. Shhh somehow I got this on sale and it was A STEAL.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Sweet Donuts

customer_reviews.title: A bargain and easy to install...
customer_reviews.text: Our old Thermidor gas cook top was failing. I decided to not repair but replace. This GE cooktop’s price seems too good to be true. The burner layout and grate design is exactly like the old Thermidor. It arrived in two days. A buddy and I removed the old unit, converted the new to propane and installed it in about 90 minutes. The instructions are simple and straightforward. The unit is a little lighter than the older. It looks great and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: R R R

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and earlier than expected. The cooktop is powerful, and we find brings things to the boil much faster than our old gas cooktop. The finish seems well built and should last a long time. The grates are also thick and durable.
customer_reviews.author: DannyB

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our 30+ year old cooktop with this. We had our gas company install it. I think I could have done it myself, though. It has made cooking a pleasure again.
customer_reviews.author: Randon Lund

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooktop
customer_reviews.text: The cooktop is very nice but my only complaint is that the knobs are made of plastic. That was something that wasn’t clear on the item description.
customer_reviews.author: Isabela N.

customer_reviews.title: A Shinning Cooktop
customer_reviews.text: The GE cooktop is well packed and arrived in a good condition. It perfectly matches the existing cutout on countertop. The cooktop runs great. The only thing I want to complain is that I had to make a trip to a local Home Depot to purchase a gas adapter to connect the gas regulator and pipe. It would be nice to include an adapter in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and good basic gas cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Cooktop works fine but while this is the model I ordered it is not the model that was delivered. The model delivered was NOT stainless steel but was black enamel. All features are the same and I was happy to accept the model delivered once we adjusted the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M. Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Working per its intended function and purposes
customer_reviews.text: It looks good out of the box and the height of just 4” making installation so much easier. What i dislike the most is the loud noise when you turn on the burner past the medium heat mark, especially when you have more than one burner turned on. My old oven don’t produce this noise. I am considering to return the unit now but am still weighing the trouble of returning and the work to disassemble and reinstall or to bear with the noise. Hate it when i am forced to make such decision.
customer_reviews.author: Dickson1130

customer_reviews.title: Great gas cooktop!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our 20 year old electric cook top with this one. Price was right, it's gas cooking (which means immediate heat). Love it. The gas line beneath does take up some room, so be aware of that. (lost about 12 inches of depth to our cabinet one one side. Not a big deal.) Cleaning is trickier since there are only two grates instead of four. Four grates would've received 5 stars on cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: JT Scott

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for the money. However I feel like it is getting over heated and the over the range oven is getting heated too. I am not sure if this is common as with our earlier Set up this was never an issue
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to clean since the igniters are located on the outside so you'll need to be careful and thorough when cleaning. It also sits quite high with the stove plates on.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good, fits standards
customer_reviews.text: My family wanted to switch out our old stove, we looked around online for hours and we came to this. This is worth every single penny. The stovetop is easy to clean, clear instructions, and doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Chao Rong

customer_reviews.title: nice and hot
customer_reviews.text: Great stovetop for the money, heats very evenly and quik.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Good price, BUT gas connection (nipple) was made out of sheet metal, and too light weight. I thought I was going to have to send it back, but got the "threads' on the nipple to stop leaking!
customer_reviews.author: D D Haskett

customer_reviews.title: Good cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great shape and works perfectly. Replaced a GE electric cook top which blew - I did the install which involved a little more than I had planned on, but par for the course. One interesting thing though - this does not heat faster than our old electric cook top, but we like the control.
customer_reviews.author: Morecowbell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great cooktop! Basic but easy to clean and light weight but sturdy grates that are easy to move. This was the best price I found anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at fair price
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, easy clean-up. "Power burner for large cookware" is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Life is Good

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Quick to turn on. Nice and spacious so easier to clean. Contractor had no problem installing.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderer

customer_reviews.title: True distribution and control of heat.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought a similar Whirlpool cooktop. Didn’t like it at all. Poor construction, cheap and burner cover peeling coating after one week. Replaced with the GE. Basic cooktop. Glad a chose this one. Very light weight grates. Not sure if this is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: JGS

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product, sturdy construction, great price. The sealed burners protect the unit in ways my previous unit didn’t. Hopefully the stainless steel will also be scratch resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for old GE cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old GE Profile glass cooktop with this and it was a great fit. Love the look and so far it has worked well. It’s easy to keep clean. Amazon had the best price by far than other big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: pattymorr

customer_reviews.title: solid stove top
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the sturdiness and performance of this stove top
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: Side knob
customer_reviews.text: Love this stove top. It has a simmer burner and a rapid boil burner. Easy to clean and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very attractive cook top the stainless is easy to clean. I'm totally satisfied with this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: It arrive as listed
customer_reviews.text: sO FAR IT ARRIVED ON TIME intact. Now we have to use it to see how its working
customer_reviews.author: E H G

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, looks nice, good heat distribution and burner sizes.
customer_reviews.author: MP Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it’s good.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is that the black cages on the top are high from the burner. Otherwise it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Mughal

customer_reviews.title: I am not the first to use it !
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the product, I found a lot of handprints. I haven't used it yet. I don't know if it will work. I feel bad! A sad shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Jianchaoli

customer_reviews.title: 699.00 retail 369.00 Amazon no brainer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase upgrade from pervious model and the price was about 200.00 less on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Willie jones

customer_reviews.title: ... be of heavier gauge but for the money a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Grates could be of heavier gauge but for the money a good value.
customer_reviews.author: joel simone

customer_reviews.title: Gas cook top
customer_reviews.text: Installation would have been easier if My unit below it was smaller
customer_reviews.author: TONEY

customer_reviews.title: The seller is a great communicator and the product is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooker and the seller is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Ajala

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Deal!
customer_reviews.text: The oven works great so far! Easy to operate! $350 was an amazing deal! Would love to buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GE JGP3030SLSS 30 Inch Gas Cooktop with MAX System, Power Broil, Simmer, Continuous Grates, Sealed Burners and ADA Compliant
product_meta.description: 30 Inch Gas Cooktop with MAX Burner System, Power Broil Burner, Simmer Burner, Continuous Grates, Sealed Burners and ADA Compliant.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars84 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
